thread.title: It’s Finally Over! ’90 Day Fiancé’ Stars Danielle & Mohamed Are Officially Divorced
thread.title_full: It’s Finally Over! ’90 Day Fiancé’ Stars Danielle & Mohamed Are Officially Divorced

author: Teresa Roca
title: It’s Finally Over! ’90 Day Fiancé’ Stars Danielle & Mohamed Are Officially Divorced

organizations.name: dirtiest reality tv divorces  as radar

text:
Danielle Mullins and Mohamed Jbali ’s toxic marriage is over! RadarOnline.com can exclusively reveal the 90 Day Fiancé stars are officially divorced.
“Yes I am divorced,” Jbali exclusively told Radar. “My legal status right now is divorced and there is no annulment.”
A spokesperson for Judge Tygh Tone of the Erie County Common Pleas Court told Radar of the March 22 court hearing, “The annulment was changed to a divorce and the divorce was granted .”
PHOTOS: Cross-Dressing, Cheaters, Sex Tapes & More! The Top 10 Dirtiest Reality TV Divorces 
As Radar previously reported, Danielle filed for an annulment on the grounds of fraud and adultery on October 4, 2016.
Mohamed said in a Facebook live video of the court hearing, “I did not talk to Danielle, all I know is I got my divorce. She had a lawyer talking for her. The judge said it’s done and that we’re divorced. They asked if I want a divorce or annulment, I said it’s the same for me.”
Although the couple has fought up until this point, he explained how they remained civil in court .
PHOTOS: Drugs, Cheating & Divorce Shockers: Jay Z & Beyonce’s Marriage Claims To Be Exposed In Juicy Tell-All 
“I got my divorce without fighting, we just got a divorce without going through the details,” he said. “We agreed to pay the bills we have together.”
Mohamed revealed that he will be returning to Tunisia following the split.
“I’m going to cancel the green card and go back to my country as quickly as possible,” he said. “It’s my decision to leave. If there were no TV show my marriage could be much better.”
PHOTOS: Nastiest Hollywood Divorces Dragged Through The Legal System 
Danielle and Mohamed’s marriage has been a toxic one, as he called the police on his then-wife for opening a DirecTV account in his name, destroying his clothes, stealing money from him and more .
None of the cases went to trial.
Infidelity also caused the demise of their marriage, as Danielle accused Mohamed of cheating on her with various women, including blonde bombshell Luisa Berry.
PHOTOS: Divorce Disaster! Desperate Lisa Marie Presley Moving Back To Graceland 
“He said he was going to Florida, but then posted photos from South Carolina to see Luisa,” Danielle previously told Radar. “Why wouldn’t you take your wife with you? This was while we were married and he was living with me.”
But Danielle isn’t innocent, as an insider close to the couple claims she was “ dating two married men at the same time .”
Both stars denied the claims made against them.
Danielle initially asked for an annulment from Mohamed, claiming he used her for a green card .
She even accused him of being abusive .
PHOTOS: Amber Heard Caught On Secret Meeting With Ex Girlfriend Amid Depp Divorce 
“When I questioned Mohamed, he was emotionally abusive and cruel to me,” she wrote of his alleged affairs in her annulment filing. “Mohamed again was back to his verbal abuse of me and withholding affection and physical touch.”
Danielle and Mohamed married on July 9, 2014.
Are you surprised by the divorce? Tell us in the comments.
We pay for juicy info! Do you have a story for RadarOnline.com? Email us at tips@radaronline.com, or call us at 800-344-9598 any time, day or night.
